page.title: 05A Sunday in Pitsea.
page.content: On Sunday I get up at nine o'clock and have my breakfast.When I have finished I clean Madge's cage out. Madge is my pet rat.When I have finished I go upstairs and get dressed.Then I spend about an hour tidying up my bedroom. Then I go downstairs and see whats on the T.V.There's usually nothing on so I spend about half an hour complaining to my mum that I'm bored.Then I see if Madge wants to come out,but usually she's asleep. Then I go upstairs and play on the computer.It's a Dragon 32.I play games like Execution or Transylvanian Tower.I play on the computer until about five o'clock when we have our tea.After I have finished I get Madge and watch T.V.At about quarter to nine I have a bath and wash my hair and then I go to bed. Suzanne Hayden.
